description.value: Training with the crew of the Nightwave has taught you their technique for reloading while leaping to board another ship. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] and then Interact to reload, or Interact to reload and then Leap. You can perform this ability as a 2-action activity to use your Leap to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.High Jump] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump] without needing to Stride at least 10 feet first.
